title: Burmese - New Testament (Book)
title_vernacular: မြန်မာ - ယဉ်ကျေးမှုအသစ်စာဌာန (စာအုပ်)
description: Burmese New Testament published by World Bible Translation Center in 2006. Burmese is a Sino-Tibetan language spoken in Myanmar, where it is an official language and the language of the Burmans, the country's principal ethnic group.

language.name: Burmese
language.area: South, central, and adjacent areas. Also in Bangladesh, Malaysia (Peninsular), Thailand, United States.
